Question & Options:
In which year did Marvel Studios announce the production of 'Avengers: Infinity War'?
Options:
A. 2012
B. 2014
C. 2016
D. 2018

What significant announcement regarding the release dates of 'Avengers: Infinity War' and 'Avengers: Endgame' was made by Marvel Studios?
Options:
A. The release date of 'Avengers: Infinity War' was pushed back to 2019.
B. The release dates were announced in October 2014.
C. Both movies were released on the same day.
D. The release date of 'Avengers: Endgame' was earlier than 'Avengers: Infinity War'.
Correct Answer: The release dates were announced in October 2014.
